text:
[Verse]
Night falls we wonder why
Stars above oh how they fly
Whispers in the dark sky high
Underneath this cosmic tie

[Verse 2]
Stardust dances in our eyes
Moonlit streets passin' by
Lost in time the world’s so wide
Heartbeats sync our souls collide

[Chorus]
Under the stars we’ll stay
No worries go away
In light of night we play
Till the break of day

[Verse 3]
Hands in hands feel the breeze
Night unfolds a mystic tease
Every shadow holds a key
Unlock the dreams we see

[Bridge]
Underneath the moonlight trace
Every thought leaves a space
Future’s calling we embrace
In this celestial place

[Verse 4]
Moon and stars they start to fade
New dawn’s light on us cascade
Dreams of night now softly laid
But our love will never shade
title: Under the Stars
